messages.title: Why I'm backing Kim Johnson
messages.content: "She has fought on the issues that matter to local people, in particular the victims of the Hillsborough disaster and the Orgreave miners and their families." \nKate Pollard, Labour Party's longest-serving woman councillor

messages.title: Defending Our Fire Service
messages.content: Kim Johnson will work with Labour to rebuild the fire service, vote for Labour to strengthen our fire service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kim Johnson and Labour will build an economy that works for all of us, not just the rich, and invest significantly in our NHS and public services.
Work with Labour to rebuild the fire service, vote Labour to strengthen our fire service.
We will stop the Tories from selling ou NHS to America.

issues.economy: Kim Johnson and Labour will build an economy that works for all of us, not just the rich.
issues.government: This election is about the next generation
issues.health: Kim Johnson and Labour will invest significantly in our NHS and public services. We will stop the Tories from selling our NHS to America.

community.content: Reopen day centres and lunch clubs for older people. Building council and affordable homes. Increase police presence on our streets. Support young families with proper education and healthcare. Introduce free bus travel for under 25s. Improve Sefton Park and the waterfront. A real living wage.

endorsements.endorsement: "She has fought on the issues that matter to local people, in particular the victims of the Hillsborough disaster and the Orgreave miners and their families." \nKate Pollard, Labour Party's longest-serving woman councillor

images.caption: Kim Johnson - A Strong Voice for Riverside

examples: Reopen day centres and lunch clubs for older people. Building council and affordable homes. Increase police presence on our streets.
This election is about the next generation.

"She has fought on the issues that matter to local people, in particular the victims of the Hillsborough disaster and the Orgreave miners and their families." \nKate Pollard, Labour Party's longest-serving woman councillor
Reopen day centres and lunch clubs for older people. Building council and affordable homes. Increase police presence on our streets.

Kim Johnson and Labour will build an economy that works for all of us, not just the rich. Kim Johnson and Labour will invest significantly in our NHS and public services. We will stop the Tories from selling our NHS to America.
We will stop the Tories from selling our NHS to America.
